AI Governance in the Public Sector

This report explores the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the public sector, its applications, and the need for governance and oversight. It provides recommendations for Washington State's AI governance efforts, including strategies for responsible AI adoption and implementation.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Responsible AI Governance
  • Value Alignment
  • Public Sector Adoption
  • AI Risk Management
  • Responsible AI
  • Human Rights Impact Assessments
  • Cybersecurity Governance
